name: Elevator Madness
description:
An urgent meeting has begun in a huge corporation, the boss calls all the employees to him, all reports and documents of urgent importance are needed, but all the elevators are broken, except for one, you need to drive all the employees to the right door!

Elevator Madness is a side scroller game with elevator control, where the player controls the direction of movement and helps employees get into the right doors, but over time, there are more and more employees, and less and less time!

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Increasing Difficulty
- Music
